hackathon-requirements: Submission instructions will be provided on-site. Submit via ChallengePost

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Lunch for you and a friend with Jason Finger
A week stay in San Diego at a beautiful 3 bedroom beachside condo (http://www.vrbo.com/503672)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Includes 24/7 access + 4 hrs of conference room time
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: One month of Open Desk space at BizHaus

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This will go to the team that best combines Twilio with Sense360's SDK.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=4132 Del Rey Avenue, Marina del Rey, CA 90292, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We’re all about creating the extraordinary. Think outside the box and try something that’s never been done before. The Sense360 SDK allows you to create super-smart apps. Take advantage of it.

Imagine that you have a million downloads. Make sure that your app will provide a smooth experience for your million+ fans. When you have a team of 10 engineers working on this app will they understand the code that you’ve written?
How much can your app do in the background using the Sense360 SDK? The more you utilize S360 tech to create invisible functionality the better!
Everyone likes something pretty. Give us something that we like to look at.

hackathon-location-address: 4132 Del Rey Avenue, Marina del Rey, CA 90292, USA
hackathon-description-header: The "Invisible" Hackathon. Create an invisible app.
